name: Bioflim
description: An acid slime organism protected by a thick rocky exoskeleton. It's slime can continually regenerate an outer shell, allowing for great defense.

name: Dromeus
description: A partially feathered ground bird with lizard features, somewhat resembling a velociraptor. These creatures are extremely quick with razor sharp teeth, and prefer to hunt in packs.

name: Tetrahive
description: A flying swarm of small creatures with teeth like piranhas, synchronously controlled by the single mind of the 'Queen' of the hive flying among them.

name: Xylum
description: A giant organism of thick, intertwined roots with thorny, tentacle-like arms. It lives mostly underground as this is where it absorbs it's power.

name: Smokat
description: Feline shaped in normal form, this clever creature can instantly atomize into a cloud of smoke for a sneak attack or quick evasion.

name: Newtapede
description: A 16 legged amphibious creature with a long, segmented body. While adapted to land, it's slender frame and webbed feet make it a formidable opponent in water.

name: Voltish
description: With bones and claws made from a tough, conductive metal alloy, this daunting creature can store electrical energy from it's surroundings and release the shock into enemies.
